column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My faves are the spicy potatoes with tomato aioli (super spicy!)
column3: the garlic potato salad (garlic lover's heaven) and the serrano ham and tomato bread.  I also really enjoy the white and peach sangrias.  And really
column4: I've never tried anything that I haven't liked here
column5: so you can't really go wrong.
